p: These findings establish Rubia naphthoquinones as an attractive possible multitarget therapeutic candidates against human cancer, alone or in combination with other antitumoral agents to overcome drug resistance and achieve better outcomes. However, despite the advanced phytochemical studies on Rubia species due to its use in traditional medicine, it remains to be disclosed the therapeutic activity of leaves ingestion on chimpanzees and whether there is a narrow link between animals and local communities medicinal uses.
